scripts.start-windows: powershell -Command "while ($true) { ts-node ./src/index.ts; Write-Host 'App crashed. Restarting...' -ForegroundColor White -BackgroundColor DarkRed }"
scripts.start-ubuntu: while true; do ts-node ./src/index.ts || { echo '\e[97;41mApp crashed. Restarting...\e[0m'; sleep 2; }; done
